shortDescription: Triggered almost every frame, with the delta-time between each called passed in.
notes: `update` is triggered 60 times a second for most of the devices, but that depends on the screen refresh rate, so it can be more or less!
`update` can be triggered for over than 2000 times a second if the vsync of the GPU was disabled due to user's configuration!

arguments.name: dt
arguments.description: The time passed since the previous `update` triggered, measured in seconds.
